title: LOMOGRAPHY
content:
HI GUYS! ANYONE AMONG YOU EVER HEARD OF LOMOGRAPHY?

I WANT TO ASSOCIATE TYPOGRAPHY WITH LOMOGRAPHY IN A WAY BECAUSE I DO FEEL THAT IN TYPOGRAPHY, WE ALL HAVE THE FREEDOM AND NOTHING LIMITS US. (THOUGH THERE ARE PROBABLY RULES OR GUIDELINES IN TYPOGRAPHY SUCH AS KERNING, SPACING ETC..) BUT THE ALL IMPORTANT THING AND THE BOTTOM LINE IS THAT WE ARE ABLE TO PASS OUR MESSAGE ACROSS AND AT THE SAME TIME, WE FIND OURSELVES LIMITLESS IN WHAT WE CAN DO.

AND OH BY THE WAY, KNOW MORE ABOUT LOMOGRAPHY PHOTOGRAPHY HERE: [WWW.LOMOGRAPHY.COM](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416175712/http:/www.lomography.com/ "WWW.LOMOGRAPHY.COM")
author: snoopy12

comments.content: Hit "caps lock" and do a search for "grunge" on google :)

i don't see how you can use type and lomo unless on prints and so on.  
Can you try to explain better your idea?  
I like lomo and holga so...

Joel Santos // youremin  
sound & visual
YES I HAVE HEARD OF LOMOGRAPHY

I am also very interested in hearing more about your idea. I am a chronic photographer of details....letterforms especially. It would be interesting to create a lomographic project of all the various type surrounding oneself.

\*
